price: (15) And these [disbelievers] await not but one blast [of the Horn]; for it there will be no delay.[1324]
arabic: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٖ
footnotes: [1324]- Or "respite."  More literally, "a period between two milkings of a she-camel," which also alludes to the meanings of "return" or "repetition."

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamā yanẓuru hāulāi illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan mā lahā min fawāqin
